Explanation: The bug in the buggy code is that it uses an uninitialized variable 'value' for comparison in the second condition. This will always be false as 'value' is 0 by default and we are not changing it anywhere. So, the condition where all the numbers are same but not 2 will never be satisfied. Generated Test cases 1-20 should pass the buggy code as they don't have all the numbers same. Test cases 21-26 should fail the buggy code as they have all the numbers same but not 2. In the previous generation, test case 12 was incorrectly predicted to fail the buggy code. This has been corrected in this generation.
